extendedInfo.description: Complete Random Number is a powerful yet simple to use random number generator. It includes support for three types of random generation:1) A number range (for example, between 1 and 49 for a lottery number)2) A decimal number (decimal between 0 and 1)3) A Gaussian number.You can return up to 99 results at a time, and set the number of decimal places (where applicable). Application also includes support for copying the results to the clipboard (just select it from the menu).Please let me know if you have any suggestions for future improvements.
